p:
The cumulative number of human H7N9 cases by infected birds, I H , can be modeled simply by
(17) where
denotes the infected bird population at time t and
is the daily number of human infection per infected bird. Note also that our model for human epidemic (17) considers only those with onset (as the human case data is by onset date), which is reasonable if we assume that, for H7N9, humans have no infectivity before onset of symptoms.
